name: mode_getValue
description: This function is used to retrieve the current mode or course setting of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to retrieve the current mode or course.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to retrieve the current mode or course.
